notes: Primary recommendation with 99.17% compatibility. RetroArch core is SwanStation (fork). Flatpak no longer maintained.
High accuracy emulator. Flatpak is Mednaffe GUI with Mednafen bundled. RetroArch cores are Beetle PSX and Beetle PSX HW.
High accuracy Japanese emulator. Memory cards stored as BU00/BU10 files without extension. Supports PocketStation.
Tool-assisted speedrun focused. Uses Mednafen's Nymashock/Octoshock core internally. Accepted by speedrun community.
Optimized for ARM devices. Best for low-powered hardware. Uses HLE BIOS if no BIOS found.
